channel.title: .conf23 Workshops on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in .conf23 Workshops on Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops

item.title: Digital Experience Monitoring (DEM)
item.description: Objective: Understand end user experience through RUM and Synthetics, and how to improve that experience in the front end. You need: Access to the Workshop Org in Splunk Observability Cloud Outline: Understand the context: what are RUM and Synthetics? Now it’s time to get hands on! Navigate the website and see results in RUM Create a Synthetic browser test Dashboards and detectors How do you compete? Advanced: multi-step browser tests Bonus: Web Optimization
